Macro Definition Documentation

#define ASSERT_MATRIX (   m)
Value:
do { \
assert( (m)->getNumDim() == 2 ); \
assert( (m)->getMajorOrder() == CblasColMajor ); \
} while(0)

Referenced by ANN::JoinANNComponent::buildErrorInputBunchVector(), ANN::JoinANNComponent::buildInputBunchVector(), ANN::JoinANNComponent::buildMatrixFloatToken(), ANN::CopyANNComponent::doBackprop(), ANN::DotProductANNComponent::doBackprop(), ANN::BiasANNComponent::doForward(), ANN::DotProductANNComponent::doForward(), and ANN::BiasANNComponent::doUpdate().

#define rnd_weight (   rnd,
  value,
  dinf,
  range,
  weightnearzero 
)
Value:
do { \
unsigned int it = 0; \
do { \
(value) = (rnd)->rand((range))+(dinf); \
it++; \
} while (it < MAX_ITERATIONS_RANDOMIZE_LOOP && \
fabs((value)) < (weightnearzero)); \
if (fabs((value)) < (weightnearzero)) \
ERROR_PRINT("# WARNING!!! Detected weightnearzero\n"); \
} while(false);

Referenced by ANN::Connections::randomizeWeights(), and ANN::Connections::randomizeWeightsAtColumn().
